mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (password, name, age, account, address, phoneNumber, job, email, birthdate, identityNum, gender, creditRating, abroad, crime, disease, drink, drive, military) VALUES (#{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{account}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{job}, #{email}, #{birthdate}, #{identityNum}, #{gender}, #{creditRating}, #{abroad}, #{crime}, #{disease}, #{drink}, #{drive}, #{military})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
